summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to negotiate, execute, grant and convey permanent utility easement rights over, under and across a portion of O. O. Denny Park to King County for the purpose of installing, constructing, operating, maintaining, removing, repairing and replacing a sewer interceptor rock collection box along with all connections, manholes and appurtenances thereto, together with the right of ingress to and egress from said portion of O.O. Denny Park, and to accept payment and reimbursement therefor.
